trans-unit.source: A Python Package for Protein Dynamics Analysis
trans-unit.target: Питоновый пакет для анализа динамики белка

trans-unit.source: Argparse module (http://code.google.com/p/argparse/) is distributed with ProDy. Argparse is developed by Steven J. Bethard and is available under the Python Software Foundation License.
trans-unit.target: Argparse module (http://code.google.com/p/argparse/) is distributed with ProDy. Argparse is developed by Steven J. Bethard and is available under the Python Software Foundation License.

trans-unit.source: Biopython (http://biopython.org/) KDTree and pairwise2 modules are distributed with ProDy. Biopython is developed by The Biopython Consortium and is available under the Biopython license (http://www.biopython.org/DIST/LICENSE).
trans-unit.target: Biopython (http://biopython.org/) KDTree and pairwise2 modules are distributed with ProDy. Biopython is developed by The Biopython Consortium and is available under the Biopython license (http://www.biopython.org/DIST/LICENSE).

trans-unit.source: CEalign module (https://pymolwiki.org/index.php/Cealign_plugin) is distributed with ProDy. The original CE method was developed by Ilya Shindyalov and Philip Bourne. The Python version which is used by ProDy is developed by Jason Vertrees and available under the New BSD license.
trans-unit.target: CEalign module (https://pymolwiki.org/index.php/Cealign_plugin) is distributed with ProDy. The original CE method was developed by Ilya Shindyalov and Philip Bourne. The Python version which is used by ProDy is developed by Jason Vertrees and available under the New BSD license.

trans-unit.source: ProDy is a free and open-source Python package for protein structure, dynamics, and sequence analysis. It allows for comparative analysis and modeling of protein structural dynamics and sequence co-evolution. Fast and flexible ProDy API is for interactive usage as well as application development. ProDy also comes with several analysis applications and a graphical user interface for visual analysis.
trans-unit.target: ProDy-это свободный и открытый Python-пакет для анализа структуры,динамики и последовательности белков.Он позволяет проводить сравнительный анализ и моделировать структурную динамику белка и коэволюцию последовательности.Быстрый и гибкий ProDy API предназначен как для интерактивного использования,так и для разработки приложений.ProDy также поставляется с несколькими аналитическими приложениями и графическим пользовательским интерфейсом для визуального анализа.

trans-unit.source: ProDy is available under MIT License. See LICENSE.txt for more details.
trans-unit.target: ProDy доступен по лицензии MIT.См.LICENSE.txt для получения более подробной информации.

trans-unit.source: Pyparsing (http://pyparsing.wikispaces.com/) module is distributed with ProDy. Pyparsing is developed by Paul T. McGuire and is available under the MIT license (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php).
trans-unit.target: Pyparsing (http://pyparsing.wikispaces.com/) module is distributed with ProDy. Pyparsing is developed by Paul T. McGuire and is available under the MIT license (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php).
